metadata.title: CVE-2024-45492 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. nextScaffoldPart inxmlparse.c can have an integer overflow for m_groupSize on 32-bit platforms(where UINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45492` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1
libexpat1 - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: expat package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1').
xmlrpc-c package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
